nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 2 is the second issue of the comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published on March 25, 2020 by Marvel Comics.
The issue features the story "Galaxy's Deadliest Part 2: Sorrow of the Syndicates," in which the bounty hunters continue their search for Nakano Lash.

BOUNTY HUNTERS DRAW FIRST BLOOD! Cyborg bounty hunter VALANCE will stop at nothing to find his old mentor, NAKANO LASH, after her stinging betrayal years earlier. But other bounty hunters have taken the job after a vicious crime lord put out the hit. Everyone's got a reason to go after the traitorous Nautolan. BOSSK, BOBA FETT and a slew of new killers are hot on Lash's trail. Can Valance get to her first? And what could have possibly made Lash break her word and betray her fellow hunters? The truth could shake the foundations of the criminal underworld in the galaxy!
